Description:
Immaculate on the inside, Beautiful on the outside!
A truly stunning property, you will fall in love with this gorgeous two bedroom townhouse fit for a first home buyer or investor looking for a spotless home, a home you will be proud of inside and out! Only three years young, this home features two bedrooms plus a study nook, master bedroom with triple robe and access to bathroom and the second bedroom with double robe. The kitchen is a delight, complete with electric oven, gas hot plates and space for a dishwasher. Also featuring an open plan meals area and cosy family room, plus enjoy ducted heating throughout to keep warm in the chilly season. Enjoy the fantastic low maintenance courtyard, the perfect place for a beverage shared amongst friends and family. Feel at ease knowing your car will be secure in your very own single remote garage with internal access. Sitting pretty in a prime position in Clyde, you will also love the convenient location, close to shops, parks, schools and public transport. Offer now or miss out.
Insights: 33 Bimberry Circuit, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2016 and 1 other 2 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
Treasure In Clyde Township!
Located on a large corner allotment, this property is screaming potential in every way! You can’t buy vacant blocks for this price any longer, let alone with a 3 bedroom house and sheds! Options of just moving in and enjoying the serenity of Clyde township, demolish the home and build 2 units on the larger than 670m2 (STCA), or renovate it into your dream home – the choices are endless. The humble home with vaulted ceilings & floorboards, light and bright renovated kitchen, 3 bedrooms and refurbished bathroom. Car enthusiasts a 75sqm shed is a bonus, plus 2 further garden sheds to store your toys! Clyde is going to be transformed in the next few years, and this property is in the heart of the action – near the school, the roads are currently being sealed at no cost to the residents – this one will sell quickly, so call today for an inspection.
Insights: 9 Oroya Grove, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2016 and 43 other 3 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
RING NOW TO INSPECT - MELWAY REF 134 J9 - DOUBLE GARAGE
OVERLOOKS THE GOLF COURSE
This beautiful home is only 2 years old located in Clyde offering 4 bedrooms, 3 living areas plus alfresco verandah, master bedroom located down stairs with walk in robe and full ensuite, two other bedrooms feature built in robes, large rumpus room, kitchen with Caesar stone bench tops, 5 burner stainless steel hotplates and dishwasher, separate family and lounge living areas plus outdoor entertaining area, gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling, 5kw solar panels, double garage with rear access, situated close to Clyde shopping centre, schools and Casey Fields sporting complex
$2167 per calendar month
Frank Barrett : 0418 800 912

Description:
Brand New Home
Located in the popular Pasadena Estate this brand new home would be perfect for those looking to move into a brand new home or purchase an investment property right away.
Comprising of 3 double bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk in robe, 2 living areas plus study, well appointed kitchen with walk in pantry
Inclusions
- Single Garage with auto panel-lift style front garage door
- Ducted heating
- Floor Tiles to Entry , Meals and Wet areas
- Carpet from builders range
- Hot plates 600mm , Stainless Steel Under- Bench Oven
- Stone Bench tops tp Kitchen and Vanities
- Gloss cupboard doors to Kitchen and vanities
- Modern vanity sinks
- Flick- Mixer tap to kitchen
- Drive and Paths
- Clear and pivot shower with Square quadretto bath.
- Fence 3 Sides
- Meals area with glass sliding external-access door
- Flush Internal Doors
- Locking aluminium throughout
PLUS LOTS MORE
This property is within walking distance from several schools, new Pasadena shopping centre, close to impressive recreation facilities and a 'few minutes' drive from major shopping centres with great access to loads of the everyday amenities you and the family could ever want.
So call today to arrange an inspection to view this fantastic property.

Description:
BRAND NEW, WITH ALL THE LUXURIES!
This home is built with you in mind. Offering the very best in family living; the home is designed to be functional and adaptable for today’s ever changing busy lifestyles. Built to an exceptional quality, for you to move straight into or invest if you wish to!
Featuring four spacious bedrooms, most with walk in robes and master with full ensuite all finished with the highest level of quality in mind. The hallway from the entrance leads to a large open plan family living area, adjacent to central hostess kitchen. Completing this family home are the advantages of an alfresco and double lock up garage.
With access to public transport, including the nearby Cranbourne train station, and surrounded by a variety of education facilities with primary and secondary schools as well as the nearby Chisholm Institute of Tafe, families will be well connected at Pasadena especially with a large new shopping complex just opened up at the entrance of the estate being walking distance.
There is an endless list of inclusions to this home, as below.
• Ceaser Stone (40mm) bench top in kitchen bathroom and ensuite
• 900mm stainless steel appliance including dishwasher
• Large showers with tilled bases
• Quality bathroom fittings and fixtures
• Fully landscaped and drive way
• Fencing and Driveway
• 6 Star energy rating with best performing orientation
• Feature facades and much more!
You can secure this home with only 5% deposit and pay nothing till you move in! You will also be eligible for FHOG*. Get in quick! Call today to book in a private inspection.

Description:
PERFECT FIRST HOME OR INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY!
This lovely property is in a great position in the sought after Pasadena Estate in Clyde. It is within walking distance to the new Clyde Shopping Centre, St. Peter's College, parks and public transport. Only three years old, your new home features:
- Three generous bedrooms, the master with a double walk in robe and full ensuite. The remaining two bedrooms have built in robes and a shared ensuite. A great feature for the kids.
- Two living areas, one an open plan area with cathedral ceilings where you can be part of all the action. The other a quiet space to relax away from the hustle and bustle of the family or for the kids to use as T.V room.
- A galley style kitchen to create fantastic meals with stainless steel appliances and a 900mm under bench oven. There's also a large walk in pantry with room to store all your appliances.
- A separate dining area and alfresco dining means you can enjoy the fabulous food you've created indoors or outdoors.
- Also included is a powder room for guests, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, remote garage and internal access to the home.
A quality built home in a fantastic family area. Only minutes from the Casey Fields Sporting Grounds, Casey Race Swimming Centre, Casey Basketball Stadium and Library. Everything you could want or need right on your doorstep. You'll kick yourself if you don't inspect this one!
Insights: 20 Scenic Avenue, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2016 and 43 other 3 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Perfect opportunity to buy a quality built home which is in a fantastic location, is walking distance to the new Clyde Shopping Centre, St. Peter's College, parks, public transport, Casey Fields Sporting Grounds, Casey Race Swimming Centre, Casey Basketball Stadium & local library. This one won't last long & it

Other features include: Floating boards, higher ceilings, down lights, ducted heating, split system cooling, stone bench tops in kitchen and bathrooms, glass splash back, dishwasher, alfresco area and many more...

Description:
Home is Where the Heart is!
Sale by Negotiation
Located in the popular Pasadena Estate, this 4 bedroom family home has been designed with family in mind. Positioned on a generous 512sqm (approx.) allotment and built by Simmons in 2013 this home presents quality and finesse.
With neutral tones throughout, making your mark has never been so easy. The master bedroom located at the front of the home comprises a contemporary ensuite and spacious walk in robe. The modern and well appointed kitchen located in the heart of the home has much to offer, with ample storage and spacious pantry making meal time a breeze. The home is complete with two generous living areas, a courtyard ideal for those family barbeques and established low maintenance gardens sure to impress your friends and neighbours. With features such as double lock up garage, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, internal garage access, solar panels and additional onsite parking ideal for caravans, boats or trailers this home is sure to impress.
Michelle Bonadio : 0417 542 678

Description:
25sq Simonds Home on BIG 605sq Block with Van/Trailer Access
Blessed with a northern focus, impeccable presentation and a spacious single level floorplan, this sunny four bedroom residence delivers the ideal easily managed environment for a busy modern lifestyle with backyard entrance for a caravan/trailer/boat. Perfect for those seeking a low maintenance family solution, its quality modern proportions appreciate lovely new outlooks, a ready to start garden and remote double garage. On one of the largest allotments of 605sqm (approx.), this home is located in a quiet pocket within the Clyde Pasadena Zone. Beautifully bright accommodation includes a central sitting and dining domain with Caesar Stone island bench that couples as a breakfast bar, immaculate East facing kitchen with gas appointments overlooking family meals, four comfortably sized bedrooms, the main in its own zone at the front with extensive built in robes/ensuite, the remaining three at the rear, also with built in robes and an appealing family bathroom with built in bath. Features ducted heating and timber floors. Minutes to Casey Fields Recreation and Aquaitc Centre, Berwick and soon to be Clyde Central shops, bus interchange as well as an array of prestigious private and public schools. The Clyde Pasadena zone encompasses its own two enormous fun filled, child friendly parks and a new golf course on its way.

Description:
Aaron Park
Alex Scott and Staff are proud to present 390 Muddy Gates Lane, Clyde. One the finest equine properties in the state and brilliantly positioned on Melbourne’s fringe.
The property boasts a two bedroom house with spilt system air conditioner and gas heating. There is also a newly renovated two bedroom cottage again with air conditioner and gas heating plus outdoor entertaining area.
The property is well setup for someone that wants to walk in and start running a business from tomorrow or a land banker looking for better than normal cash flow. The grounds offer 6 stables with power, workshop/shed x 2 with power and concrete floor, private horse paddocks without boxes x 6, with boxes x 13, 11 lockers/tac rooms, 11 covered tie up, round yard, 1 quarantine stable, 4 bay machinery shed, 2 x 40,000L water tanks, all troughs are fed by 19m deep bore with back up options to pump from the dams or water tanks if required. Remote controlled gates and alarm system offer that extra piece of mind.
The arena is state of the art 60x22.5 fitout with grandstand, solar power, office, kitchen, bunkhouse which sleeps 4, toilets x 2, shower, change room, lighting, sprinkler system and flood lighting around the exterior of the property.
Based on projections by the Bureau of Statistics - by 2060 Melbourne will overtake Sydney doubling its population to 8.5 million, making land on the city fringe the place to buy. Aaron Park is only 1.7km from the urban growth boundary.
Buy today to secure your tomorrow. For further information call Matt Koster for your own private inspection.
Insights: 390 MUDDY GATES LANE, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2016 and 3 other 5 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

LOCATION IS EVERYTHING
Stop looking.... we have found it for you! It's not often you find the perfect home with all the desired amenities at your doorstep! This ultra-modern, high-quality built Henley home, set in the sought after Pasadena Estate, is sure to impress. The home features:
- 4 spacious bedrooms - master with en-suite and walk-in robe
- Entertainers kitchen fitted with quality stainless-steel appliances and stone benches
- 2 separate living zones include family/meals area plus second lounge
-Undercover outdoor entertaining area and plenty of backyard for the kids to play
Extra comforts include: double garage with internal access, ducted heating, security alarm system, timber look floors, modern fixtures and fittings throughout and much more! Not to mention the spectacular location with the brand new shopping centre about to open, Casey Race recreation and aquatic centre and future golf course at the end of the street! Close by to quality schools, parks, shops and public transport - this one is not to be missed! For your private inspection, call today!

Description:
Family Lifestyle or Investment, You Decide? - 1 Acre (4047m2) Approx
In the much sought after old Clyde Township, this very private 3 bedroom ranch style family home with an adjoining 1 bedroom self contained unit is set on a lovely 1 acre of gardens, in 2 separate titles and currently zoned urban growth, offering not only a great family atmosphere, but also enormous potential for investment and capital growth.
Features a large formal lounge with timber floors and a wood heater, ducted heating, a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, lots of cupboard and bench space and overlooks the paved patio/bbq area, a tiled meals area with air conditioning, 3 big bedrooms with robes, ensuite and a huge laundry.
The attached 1 Bedroom unit has its own kitchen, lounge, laundry, ensuite and access.
Outside is a double carport, a separate carport for a caravan, 2 separate work sheds, 2 driveways and all this overlooks other large acreage properties, offering a private semi rural lifestyle, yet all within close proximity to schools, shops, parks and with easy access to both the city and bays.
A great all round package, come see for yourself.

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT/ UNDER OFFER!
Traditional Clyde (121324786): Homes in this area do not come along very often, this is a chance for you to own a property in an area that everyone wishes to live in. Only moments to the local general store, Clyde primary school and local parklands, it's the perfect place to call home.
Positioned on a huge block of just under a 1/4 acre app. this gem is a must see, It showcases 4 bedrooms, the master with WIR and ensuite. The other 3 rooms have easy access to the central newly renovated family bathroom complete with separate shower and bath facilities. A light and bright living zone is featured upon entry whilst the well-appointed central kitchen provides sufficient cupboard and bench space plus a dishwasher. With the great sized sunken 2nd living area with direct access outside will make entertaining or family life a breeze with room of everyone.
Those who appreciate entertaining are bound to fall in love with the fantastic outdoor pergola providing plenty of room to enjoy the sun in the coming months surrounded by beautiful professional landscaping. The back yard also offers plenty of room for the kids and pets to run a muck and with the huge shed/ garage it is perfect for those who run their own business, like to work on cars or just needs room for all of the toys.
Added internal extras include gas heating, multiple split system cooling units, wood fire place, ceiling fans, floating floorboards and plenty of natural light!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW! - *PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS*!
Our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and the vendor's expectations. You can view with confidence that vendors will sell within the range with fair terms and conditions.

Description:
Investors or first home buyers
This single storey house has all you need for a luxury lifestyle : 3bed rooms, spacious master BR with ensuite , 1 separate bathroom , two very spacious living areas, remote control single lock up garage.
This property is also located in close proximity to popular local schools Lighthouse Christian College, Clyde Primary School . Few minutes drive to Precinct Parks, Cranbourne Shopping Centre , Cranbourne train station.
Internal features include: High Ceiling, Gas Ducted Heating, Designer kitchen with stone grand island benchtop ( Luxury 900mm European style stainless steel appliances), Quality carpet in all bedrooms and Porcelain tile in living areas ,Kitchen and all wet areas., Luxury basins and deluxe tapware.
External features include : Driveway, path and fencing ,contemporary front landscaped garden, Estate covenants and guidelines, Recycled water on tap.
“An astute buyer / investor should not miss this rare opportunity
Insights: 43 other 3 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
Premier Position in the Pasadena Estate!
If you have been looking for a quality property situated in the Pasadena Estate in Clyde North, then look no further than this beautiful brand new townhouse.
This stylish three bedroom open plan home features a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, study nook, powder room, European style laundry, low maintenance back garden and direct access from the garage.
This home has the benefit of a quiet lifestyle offering a future golf course, walking distance to Casey Fields and Casey Race, beautiful parks and shopping precinct within walking distance, plus only minutes to Cranbourne's town centre. Contact our friendly team for your private inspection.
Insights: 8 Sticht Way, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2015 and 43 other 3 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.
